alert.note: Alert for Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 10 at 3:30AM HST until December 10 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF HAWAII AND MAUI COUNTIES UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... .Windy trade winds will gradually weaken and become breezy later tonight. The strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas between mountains. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Molokai Hawaii. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down tree branches, blow away tents and unsecured objects, and make driving conditions difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Be prepared for possible power outages.
